message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the product at a price of $1,400,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.
Alice, your offer is a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $1,300,000 for the product. This is a fair price considering your value for it and my budget. Let's see if we can strike a deal.
I appreciate your offer, Bob, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,350,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
